1. Kami sdh melakukan booking dari beberapa hari sebelumnya, tapi saat kami datang untuk check in, kami masih harus menunggu agak lama untuk kamar kami ready. Sedangkan tamu yang baru datang sdh bisa langsng mendapatkan kamar.

2. Kami booking dengan dinner. Sudah bilang untuk ready pukul 19.00. Ternyata ready nya sekitar pukul 20.30 sampai kami harus 2x croscheck ke bagian receptionist

3. Kami menitipkan ice gel tgl 11 desember 2020 pukul 09.00 untuk dimasukkan kedalam freezer. Tapi keesokanharinya ternyata ice gel nya tidak dimasukan ke dalam freezer. Baru dimasukkan tgl 12 desember 2020 pukul 07.30. Padahal kami checkout pukul 08.30. Sehingga icegel belum beku ataupun dingin.

4. Pembersihan kamar kurang rapi dan bersih. Walau kami menginap lebih dari sehari, setidaknya kamar dibersihkan dan dirapikan kembali seperti kami pertamakali masuk. Tidak hanya membereskan tempat tidur. Dan handuk yang basah tidak diganti dgn yg baru

text:
We work in the nearby estates of ketapang and every chance we get to come out to the city, we blindly choose Grand Zuri.
Staff and Rooms: The staff is super friendly and helpful. The Rooms are well priced. Not too expensive. They are clean and of good size. And during Covid, I like, trust and approve their preparedness for cleanliness and sanitisation.
Food: BIG SHOUT OUT TO THE CHEF AND HIS TEAM
We are Indians, vegetarians and absolute foodies on top of that.. and in this part of the world, you don't get food that suits our pallette. Until you meet Chef Heri at Grand Zuri Ketapang. He is an angel for us who crave indian flavours.. His experience with the flavours in Gulf makes him confident to even try out recipes we share with him and customizer based on available ingredients. It's a very happy feeling to be able to connect with a chef so well. For as long as we stay in the estates, this hotel will be our get-away center.
title: Frequent and Loyal guests at Grand Zuri Ketapang.
